price: 20. Hinnak korosey tah iyyaay tah ni тага как ittaanaah sin cattam? yalli sin digaalam faxek, Racmaan kinni Rabbi akke waytek, koroosite mari tú bagul mayan sheetan keenit abah yan duquurisiyya akke waytek.
arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ جُندٞ لَّكُمۡ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: amman hādhā alladhī huwa jundun lakum yanṣurukum min dūni al-raḥmāni ini al-kāfirūna illā fī ghurūrin
